title: Target, Alibaba, Moderna: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Fed minutes due Wednesday could clarify when the central bank will begin to tighten policy
body:
Futures are slipping ahead of the release of minutes from the Federal Reserve’s July policy meeting. Here’s what we’re watching before Wednesday’s opening bell.
